name: hand2mind Plastic Mini Geared Clock, Learning Clock Classroom Kit, Clock for Kids Learning to Tell Time, Yellow Practice Clock for Kids, Teaching Clock, School Supplies (Set of 1)
short_description: CLOCK LEARNING FOR KIDS: Kids can learn to tell time with this easy-to-read 12-hour kids' clock for learning time.
EASY TO READ ANALOG CLOCK: This analog clock has large red hour numbers and dots all around the edge to make learning how to read minutes easy.

COLOR-CODED MOVABLE CLOCK HANDS: The moveable hands make it easy for kids to understand the relationship between hours and minutes. The clock hands are color-coded- the red hand is for hour and blue hand is for minute.
GEARED CLOCK FOR KIDS: The internal gears maintain correct hour and minute relationships just like a real analog clock!
1ST GRADE MATH CLASSROOM ESSENTIALS: Teaching time clocks are great for individual use and for small groups. A must-have for your classroom this year!
product_description: Children learn to tell time with this easy to read 12 hour kids learning clock. Each school clock measures 4". The moveable hands make it easy for kids to understand the relationship between hours and minutes. The learning time clock hands are color-coded, red hand is for hour and blue hand is for minute. The internal gears maintain correct hour and minute relationships just like a real analog clock. It encourage students to learn how to tell time with this hands-on geared clock faces by providing visual representation. This set includes 1 learning clock. The analog clock for kids learning includes stand to hold clock upright. The plastic clock is durable and easy to clean. Teaching time clocks are great for individual use, small groups, or centers. Clock learning for kids make learning time engaging for your kids. These kids learning clock allow your students to develop a deeper understanding of time through hands-on experiences. Analog clocks are Montessori math themed, meaning that they're hands-on for kids to learn on their own. For over 50 years, hand2mind has encouraged hands-on learning and discovery, driving deeper understanding and helping children unlock their full potential. Hand2mind specializes in math manipulatives designed to help students learn by doing. When learning to tell time, hand2mind provides telling time activity centers, analog clocks for kids learning, standard yellow clocks and our featured NumberLine Clock. From early math to middle school math, hand2mind has you covered with products designed to enhance learning in the classroom and the world around us. Through hands-on exploration and discovery we strive to find new ways to encourage students in math practice, literacy activities, STEM education and more!

short_description: TEACH early time skills with this hands-on learning clock!

AGES 5+
product_description: It's time to teach time! Help kids learn and master essential early time skills with the Big Time Mini Clock from Learning Resources. This 4" durable plastic learning clock contains hidden gears that maintain the correct hour and minute relationships as you turn, making it easy for kids to visualize the relationship between the hour hand and the minute hand. To make things even easier, each hand is color coded to match the clock's hour and minute markings and draw an even clearer parallel between the movements and the passage of time. When kids aren't practicing hands-on time activities, the Big Time Mini Clock rests just like a real desktop clock thanks to its included removable stand. Made from study plastic that wipes clean easily, this teaching clock is ready for years and years of learning and play!

short_description: Multifunctional Musical Clock Toys - Our educational clock includes 7 sections: time learning, quizzes, 2-level volume control, bilingual, music, repetition, numbers and shapes. Children's interactive choices in different sections will make them feel that learning time is so interesting. In addition, our clock toys have a convenient handle so kids can take them anywhere, making them great travel toys for car rides, airplanes, classrooms, restaurants, and quiet time.

2 Modes to Learn Time - TIME Mode: Move the minute hand to 6, and our toy clock will tell you "the time is 6 o'clock". QUIZ Mode: Our toy clock will ask, "Show me the time 6?" and then ask you to move the minute hand to 6. During playtime, the toy lights up and actively invites children to the next learning session, making its interactivity crucial for engaging children. With this time learning clock, teaching your child to read the clock has never been easier.

Early Educational Learning Toys - When children move the minute hand, the toy will make interesting sounds to attract children's attention to learn time. This method not only exercises their hearing, but also stimulates their imagination to think and learn the concept of time, allowing them to learn and grow in happiness.This Montessori toy is perfect for children and helps promote brain development.

Quality & Safety Children Toys - Our clock toys are made of high-quality, safe, and non-toxic materials. The smooth edges protect your child's health, while the sturdy construction withstands vigorous play. The gentle music protects your kid's hearing and provides a more enjoyable play experience. This fantastic musical clock learning toy is suitable for toddlers and children no matter boys or girls. It requires 3 AA batteries (not included).

Ideal Gifts for Kids - This clock toy for children ages 3-6 is an ideal learning gift for preschool and kindergarten, and a great sensory learning companion. This fantastic musical clock learning toy is perfect for toddlers and kids ages 3, 4, 5, 6 making it an ideal gift for birthdays, Halloween, Christmas, Easter baskets, or even homeschooling. Your child will love this fun and adorable Montessori clock toy!

short_description: 2-in-1 Math & Time Learning: This Montessori math toy combines number blocks, math symbols, counting hands, and a colorful clock. Children can explore numbers, operations, and time concepts all in one engaging activity board, keeping learning fun and structured.

Addition & Subtraction Play: With number tiles and double-sided math cards, kids use these Montessori math manipulatives to practice equations. Turning addition and subtraction into a fun game builds logical thinking, preschool math skills, and confidence for school readiness.

Learn to Tell Time: A colorful clock helps toddlers connect hours and minutes to daily routines like meals, play, and bedtime. This Montessori learning toy makes telling time fun and interactive, while building cognitive skills, focus, and real-life awareness—an engaging math toy for kids.

Montessori Inspired Growth: More than just math, this set builds concentration, problem-solving, and hand-eye coordination. As children play, they also strengthen fine motor control and memory—important developmental skills that prepare them for independence and future learning.

Safe, Durable & Gift-Ready: Made of child-safe, durable materials with smooth edges and bright colors. Includes a storage bag for easy cleanup and organization. Great for preschool classroom activities, educational learning toys for toddlers ages 3+, or birthday gifts for boys and girls.

What would you do at this time of day? Have breakfast, brush your teeth or maybe read a book, use your daily routine to learn the times of the day.
